change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Includes visitation reports, statistics, memorias and repuestas from Sonora and Chihuahua of Francisco María Pícolo, Francisco Xavier de Medrano, Luis Fernández, José Neumann, Bartolomé Bruan, Antonio de Ydiáquez, Antonio Martini, Jorge Hostinsky, Balthasar de la Pena, Francisco Hermano Glandorff and Lorenzo Mendivil.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Temporalidades (MS 204). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes visitation reports, statistics, memorias and repuestas from Sonora and Chihuahua of Francisco María Pícolo, Francisco Xavier de Medrano, Luis Fernández, José Neumann, Bartolomé Bruan, Antonio de Ydiáquez, Antonio Martini, Jorge Hostinsky, Balthasar de la Peña, Francisco Hermano Glandorff and Lorenzo Mendivil.
Photocopy of typescript Spanish transcription and English translation.
